Title: Relates to persistent driving while intoxicated; repealer
Summary: Relates to the offense of persistent driving while intoxicated including specific driver's license requirements if convicted.
LawCode: Add Part 3 Title Q Art 300 §§300.00 - 300.03, amd §70.00, Pen L; amd §§504 & 1193, rpld §1193 sub 1 ¶(c) sub¶¶ (ii) & (ii-a), V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to persistent driving while intoxicated; and to repeal certain provisions of the vehicle and traffic law relating thereto
